snippet.title: Times Trials: An Anime Math Puzzle Game
snippet.description:
Get ready to dive into a world where math meets excitement with Times Trials, the ultimate math adventure that turns learning into a game of strategy and skill!

In this thrilling game, you'll stack, strategize, and solve your way through levels filled with numbers and fractions. Your mission? Place the blocks strategically to reach objectives like adding up to 21, multiplying to 60, and more!

Perfect for players of all ages, Times Trials offers both single-player and competitive modes. Sharpen your math skills solo or challenge friends and family.

Why is this game perfect for your family? Not only does it make math engaging and fun, it also promotes quick thinking, problem-solving, and a friendly spirit of competition. Parents, watch your kids embrace math with enthusiasm. Kids, get ready to turn math into an exciting adventure! Let's make math everyone's favorite subject with Times Trials.

Ready to embark on a math-filled journey? Check out our Steam page now and get a sneak peek into the world of Times Trials. It's time to play, learn, and conquer math challenges like never before!

Steam page:  Coming Soon
